body:
Expose serial/parallel build (MPI), RZ geometry, CUDA/OpenMP backends, Clang, and Ascent bindings.

Interestingly, `warpx +ascent` (@cyrush) currently leads to an infinite loop in the Spack concretizer (@tgamblin).

CC for review: @dpgrote @MaxThevenet @RemiLehe
title: WarpX: MPI, Backends, RZ, Ascent
